resources.string: Not a member yet? Sign up here
An e-mail has been sent to you with a link to change your password
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Make sure to disable battery optimization!
A confirmation email has been sent. Follow the link in your e-mail and then press the button below to sign in.
An error occurred. Please retry to start the test
An error occurred. Please retry to complete the test.
You previously connected to this device:
You have no previous device connections
Connect to a new Bluetooth-enabled device
Welcome! Are you ready for a new test?
Press the button to start the test
Please connect your smartwatch to the phone/tablet before starting the test.
ERROR: You are not wearing the belt correctly. Readjust the belt.
Please enter your Registered E-mail ID below:
The input to this field must be an integer
Still haven\'t received the mail yet? Please click on the button above
You will shortly receive a confirmation mail in your inbox. Please click on the attached link to confirm your account

Welcome to the Wellness Monitor! In the options menu, you can select a time for your wellness test reminders. You must do the test in the morning before you eat breakfast. Tests must be completed Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays. Click "Start Orthostatic Test" to begin.
An e-mail confirmation will be sent to the e-mail address you provided. If you do not get the e-mail within two to three minutes, click "Resend E-mail".
Enter the e-mail address that you used to register, press “Submit,” and a link will be sent for you to reset your password.

Enter the e-mail and password that you used to register, and then press "Sign in". If you forgot your password, click on "Forgot Password". If you have no yet registered, click the link on the bottom of the screen.

Answer the following questions about your day yesterday. The sliding bar questions display a statement, which you rank from "false" to "true" by sliding the bar from left to right. The numeric answers require you to enter a number into the text box. Press "Done" when you finish and wait until the application goes back to the Welcome screen

Enter your credentials into the text fields. Make sure that the passwords match, and that the e-mail you provided is valid and has not already been linked to a Wellness Monitor account, or else an error will appear when you try to register. The app is in English by default, but you can set it to French by clicking the "French" button. Please be sure to set a birthdate and gender; these fields are required. When you are done, click "Sign Up".

Find your heart rate monitoring belt from the list of Bluetooth devices in range. If you previously connected to it, click "reconnect". Make sure that this device is in range and functioning properly, or else you will not be able to begin the test.

The orthostatic test requires you to sit down and/or stand up for 5 minutes. When you press "Start," the phone will vibrate and tell you what to do. When you are done, you will complete a questionnaire about your day yesterday.
Attention! A fatigue risk has been detected.
No fatigue risk detected. Please continue your normal lifestyle and activity regimen.
Please complete the test or questionnaire as soon as possible
Heart rate statistics of your last workouts
Please select the history graph you want to display
You don\'t have any registered workout yet
Click on any point to display the duration
Click on any blue circle to display the average heart rate
Warning! If you do not fill out the questionnaire, the test will not be complete.
